background: Provision a production-grade Aurora MySQL 8.0 cluster across three AZs with automatic failover, encrypted storage, 72-hour backtrack, and enhanced monitoring. Configure reader auto-scaling using Application Auto Scaling, CloudWatch alarms for replica lag and writer CPU, and SNS notifications. Enable Database Activity Streams with a dedicated KMS CMK and Kinesis stream via a Lambda-backed custom resource, using least-privilege IAM roles, secure networking (VPC subnets and security groups), and exported endpoints for application integration.
